item.description:
http://registration.porcfest.com/ is LIVE! 
Promo code "FACEBOOK" will save you 20% on registration and more! 
Early Bird registration ends May 1st

ITS OFFICIAL! The Porcupine Freedom Festival is once again a WEEK LONG EVENT!

Imagine hanging out with 1000+ friendly freedom lovers, experiencing a true market society amongst those who believe in voluntary cooperation. 

Concerts, speakers, cook offs, rap battles, bonfires, shooting trips, open bars, entrepreneurial opportunities, pole dancing, smoke circles, hippy bongo playing, debates, state-free marriages, and more!


Reserve your cabin/room/camp/RVsite
http://www.rogerscampground.com/
item.name: PorcFest 2011 - The Porcupine Freedom Festival!
